home.title: L'embrace | Handcrafted Jewelry & Accessories
home.description: Discover elegant handcrafted jewelry and accessories at L'embrace. Unique pieces made with love and attention to detail. Shop our exclusive collection.

products.title: Shop Jewelry & Accessories | L'embrace
products.description: Browse our collection of handcrafted jewelry and accessories. Find unique earrings, necklaces, bracelets, and more at L'embrace.

about.title: About Us | L'embrace
about.description: Learn about L'embrace, our passion for handcrafted jewelry, and the story behind our unique creations. Elegance in every detail.

contact.title: Contact Us | L'embrace
contact.description: Get in touch with L'embrace. We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message about our handcrafted jewelry and accessories.

cart.title: Shopping Cart | L'embrace
cart.description: Review your shopping cart at L'embrace. Complete your order for handcrafted jewelry and accessories.

favorites.title: My Favorites | L'embrace
favorites.description: Your saved favorite items at L'embrace. View and manage your wishlist of handcrafted jewelry and accessories.

payment.title: Checkout | L'embrace
payment.description: Complete your purchase at L'embrace. Secure checkout for your handcrafted jewelry and accessories.

paymentSuccess.title: Order Confirmed | L'embrace
paymentSuccess.description: Thank you for your order at L'embrace. Your handcrafted jewelry is on its way.

footer.tagline: Elegance in every detail â€“ handcrafted for you.

empty.title: No favorites yet
empty.description: Start browsing our products and add items to your favorites by clicking the heart icon.

noProducts.title: No products found
noProducts.description: We couldn't find any products matching your search criteria. Try adjusting your search terms or filters to find what you're looking for.

product.soldOut: Sorry, this item is currently sold out
product.maxItems: You have already added the maximum available quantity to your cart
product.quantityAdjusted: Quantity adjusted to maximum available stock

payment.orderError: An error occurred while processing your order. Please try again later.

success.title: Thank you for your order!
success.message: Your order has been successfully received and is being processed.

confirmation.title: Confirmation email
confirmation.description: You will receive a confirmation email within a few minutes with all the details of your order.

processing.title: Processing
processing.description: We are processing your order and preparing it for shipment.

shipping.title: Shipping
shipping.description: You will receive an email once your package has been shipped with tracking information.

failed.title: Payment Failed
failed.message: A problem occurred while processing your payment.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
contact.success: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully. We'll get back to you soon.
contact.error: Sorry, there was an error sending your message. Please try again.

email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address (e.g., user{'@'}example.com)

phone.invalid: Please enter a valid phone number

name.tooShort: Name must be at least 2 characters long
name.tooLong: Name must be less than 50 characters
name.invalid: Name can only contain letters, spaces, hyphens, and apostrophes

validation.minLength: {field} must be at least {min} characters long

general.title: Something went wrong
general.message: We encountered an unexpected error. Please try again.

network.title: Connection error
network.message: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your internet connection and try again.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.message: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

products.title: Unable to load products
products.message: We couldn't load the products. Please try again.

product.title: Unable to load product
product.message: We couldn't load this product. It may have been removed or is temporarily unavailable.

favorites.title: Unable to load favorites
favorites.message: We couldn't load your favorites. Please try again.

toast.messageSent: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.
toast.apiError: Failed to send message. Please try again.

contact.success: Thank you! Your message has been sent.
contact.validationError: Please complete all required fields correctly.
contact.apiError: Could not send your message. Please try again later.
